description:
When consumed, the user's voice will be delayed for a period of time, based on the amount of candy ate
Each candy can delay the user's voice for 10 minutes.
If a person puts it in their ear, everything they hear turns into a joke that is very funny.
This gadget is used to control the mind like the mythological creatures of Japanese (Tanuki).

When consumed, any events said by the user will forcibly occur in the other way around.
It is able to affect subjects any point in the timeline. For example, when Suneo insults Nobita who curses him with the potion's effects, a dog suddenly appears out of nowhere and viciously attacks Suneo, and when Nobita laments on Doraemon's premature departure, the latter suddenly pops out inside his room.

jp_name: アトカラホントスピーカー Atokarahonto supīkā
description: Hold this bullhorn up to your mouth and tell a lie, and that lie will then become truth.
It is used to detect and find people who need help.

jp_name: ふんわりズッシリメーター
description: This meter can be used to modify the weight of a person or object. Point the meter towards the thing you want to use it on, and press the one of the buttons on either side. If you want to make it heavier, push the + button, if you want to make it lighter, push the negative (-) button.

jp_name: 幸運の銃 Kōun no jū
description: There are four bullets, three of them are red and one black. Get hit by the red bullet, and one will have a day of good luck. Get hit by the black bullet, and one will have a day of bad luck.

Wearing this on one's mouth and lying to someone makes them believe that the spoken lie is true, even though it is actually not. To stop the effect of the gadget, the wearer has to conclude that it is a lie.

</gallery>

jp_name: 横たわる機械 Yokotawaru kikai
description: When the user tells a lie (or joke) to the person, that person will believe whatever that user has told him/her, regardless of how ridiculous or unbelievable it was.
